name: Dichemy
description:
Hello! This is Dichemy, a GMTK Game Jam 2022 Submission!

The theme this year is "Roll of the Dice". The name is a combination of the theme with the game's tenuous alchemical flavor.

In Dichemy, you find a magic dice that grants you access to a special ability - but only one at a time!

Due to the nature of the jam, this is a prototype game, probably closest to a platformer of some kind. You see it being adapted to a metroidvania or similar, perhaps. There are definitely some movement quirks I haven't ironed out yet, so sorry about those.

See if you can locate the (not all that) hidden garden!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to swing sword, or whatever that is
  • E to shoot fireballs
  • Q to activate shield
  • R to get a better ability
  • Esc to exit level
  • Nothing to sit and vibe to the music

Made with:

  • Engine: Godot (First time using Godot outside of a tutorial for me! It's been great!)
  • Art: Asesprite
  • Music: Logic Pro
  • Sound Effect: Audacity

The font used is from here: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7! All other art, code, and sound was made by me (hambones) with the help of these tools within the 48 hour period.

First game jam! Was super fun :)
